title: Maxim Van Gils Delivers on the Hype, Stuns UAE Emirates at Ruta del Sol
content:
Rising Belgian sensation outkicks two UAE riders in final of hilly stage for first win since controversial transfer to Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe.

Read the full article at Maxim Van Gils Delivers on the Hype, Stuns UAE Emirates at Ruta del Sol on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
